rows.label: qst103301_msg001
rows.name: Do you remember me? (temp)

rows.label: qst103301_msg002
rows.name:
Please deliver this to
my siblings (temp)

rows.label: qst103301_msg101
rows.name: Did you deliver it? (temp)

rows.label: qst103301_msg0001
rows.name: May I help you? ...Hmm? Oh?

rows.label: qst103301_msg0002
rows.name: You all look familiar...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0003
rows.name: Ah! From that time!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0004
rows.name:
Don't you remember? I'm
Elnos! I was recruited as
a Driver in Torigoth!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0005
rows.name: Do you remember watching?

rows.label: qst103301_msg0006
rows.name: I remember it clearly.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0007
rows.name: I forgot.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0021
rows.name: You remember! Thank you.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0041
rows.name:
What... I remember you. It was
the memorable moment when I
resonated with a Core Crystal.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0042
rows.name:
How could I forget the faces
of those who watched over me?

rows.label: qst103301_msg0043
rows.name:
After that, I came to the Imperial
Capital, Alba Margen, for training.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0101
rows.name:
And I finally became a Driver
belonging to the army.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0102
rows.name:
Because I'm in the army, I can
now send money to my siblings.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0103
rows.name:
Their lives are better than before,
but without our parents, I'm sure
my siblings are still lonely...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0104
rows.name:
Well, my parents hated the
Superbian Empire, so they'd
probably be angry if they knew...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0105
rows.name: Yes, well... A lot has happened...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0106
rows.name:
Oh, yes, Alba Margen has
so many different things!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0107
rows.name:
I want to give my siblings food and
toys they've never seen before.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0108
rows.name:
But I can't get much time
off, so it's hard for me
to go back to Torigoth.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0109
rows.name:
I bought some sweets, but
I'm afraid they'll go bad
before I can give them.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0110
rows.name: Are you sure? Thank you!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0111
rows.name:
I'll go gather the
things I want to send!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0112
rows.name:
I packed too much, so it's
heavy... but I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0113
rows.name:
My siblings are in the Garagorm
Residential Zone in Torigoth.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0114
rows.name:
There are three of them: Niro,
Zelan, and Morike! Please
don't get them mixed up!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0115
rows.name:
Their names are Neel, Zelan and
Morike! Don't get it wrong, yeah?

rows.label: qst103301_msg0116
rows.name:
Full-Sky Jewel Tarte... I wish I
could have let Mom eat it too...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0117
rows.name:
I didn't include anything
perishable, but I'd appreciate
it if you could deliver it soon!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0118
rows.name:
There's nothing too breakable in
there, but if you could deliver
it ASAP I'd be really grateful!
